website_summaries.verdict: This mop does a decent job picking up dirt, debris, and other messes in a basic design.
pros: Earns rave reviews for its comfortable hand grip and machine washable head
cons: The head may not be quite as "thirsty" as advertised

customer_reviews.title: It mops the floor
customer_reviews.text: This sufficiently cleans the 120 or so square feet of tile I have. My cats like to chase it as well. If you've ever seen a cat run on a wet floor, you'll understand why I enjoy mopping so much more now.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop
customer_reviews.text: I've used this kind of mop for years. When my last one fell apart after over 10 years I tried to find another in the stores. They don't carry them so as usual I got it through Amazon. This mop is light weight, mops and rinses well, and is machine washable. It doesn't leave streaks and rings out well so you don't have puddles. When you need a mop head refill after months of use Amazon has them.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: It’s a basic mop. And it works like a basic mop.
customer_reviews.text: There’s not much to say except it’s a mop. The price could be less and that would make it more attractive to purchase. I’m really happy to have this mop. Now I have a clean floor. Thank you Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A longer handle would also be nice. Other than that
customer_reviews.text: The "root" where the fabric strips meet & attach needs a lot more padding; it scrapes across my floors. A longer handle would also be nice. Other than that, it serves it's purpose fine.
customer_reviews.author: August Muse

customer_reviews.title: Mop
customer_reviews.text: Works well. No problems. I use it with a 2-well bucket which has an attachment over one of the wells to press out excess water. I got the bucket at a local hardware store. The mop wouldn't be so great to use with just a single bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Guy

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT N THIRSTY LIVES UP TO ITS NAME.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mop. You do have to wring it out by hand, but it absorbs wet clean ups quickly and rinses out well. I just throw it in the washing machine when needed. Light N Thirsty is a perfect name for this mop, because it describes it to a tee.
customer_reviews.author: PEG

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but hard to clean floors.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new mop and this came highly reviewed, but like the other reviewers have said, it feels like and does take some work to get caked dirt off the floor. Will be looking for a new mop.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent mop. it looks small but it super absorbent and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Naddy2.0

customer_reviews.title: GREAT mop - so light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: GREAT mop - so light and easy to use. I had one before, lasted for I bet 20 years. I couldn't find one locally, so ordered thru Amazon. It's great, dries fast, so no moldy smell. I have a big tile floor and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and absorbs a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and absorbs a lot of water. Does a good job for light cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mop head itself is a little thin, i'd pick cotton next time
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife like it she think it worked very well for tiles
customer_reviews.author: cwong

customer_reviews.title: House cleaners like them
customer_reviews.text: House cleaner loves them, I don't like getting my hands dirty wringing out the mops.
customer_reviews.author: Ps2os2

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! Soaks up all the water. Cleans evenly. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint

customer_reviews.title: Good Mop for Soaking Up Water...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to soak up water around a hot tub. This does the trick, and I feel it would make a good regular mop too!
customer_reviews.author: W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mop
customer_reviews.text: Love these mops. I have two of them, and gone are the days of heavy, hard to wring mops.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: I am reluctant to wax poetic about a mop, so I won't. It does the job and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Thurzday_Next

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it can be used for bathrooms or smaller spaces. What a waste
customer_reviews.author: Carolina G

customer_reviews.title: Great mop at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason these mops have been around forever: they work! It's lightweight but has plenty of cloth strips to do the job, is easy to wring out and wash and dry like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Meld

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these mops. Very absorbent and lasts for a long time. This is my choice for a mop.
customer_reviews.author: mntngal100

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mop out there. Used this type & brand for thirty years. Picks up sand it's great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you shop for a mop then this is the mop for you.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mop. It makes mopping my floors much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieNinjaSuperSquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wring out, light for mopping. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Anderson Author

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done without being messy. Lightweight, easy to ring out and rinses nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie D

customer_reviews.title: easy to ring out -light -does a great job on ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to ring out -light -does a great job on the laminate floors-don't have to stoop over------its a win win
customer_reviews.author: paul milner

customer_reviews.title: nice product, wish I would have gotten one that ...
customer_reviews.text: nice product, wish I would have gotten one that would wring itself. but overall nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Towle

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop. I have limited storage, so I use rubber gloves to wring it out. My other one got ruined from a flood in the basement that filled up with gross water.
customer_reviews.author: L.Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! It's so easy to install refills and mop
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kruckeberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this mop because it is so lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mop for me. Light weight & gets in all the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Lana O.

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop super lite cleaning is a breeze .
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop. It is smaller but works perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Bent mop handle
customer_reviews.text: The mop handle arrived bent. Is it too late to return it? It is still in the box
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with the O'Cedar Wringing mop bucket and is the best way to mop that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Farley

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job & with the red bucket it's great
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a light weight mop & this was the one.It does a good job & with the red bucket it's great.
customer_reviews.author: annie t

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job with Murphy's Oil Soap
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Does a great job with Murphy's Oil Soap.
customer_reviews.author: Manali J Shah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these mops. Please keep making them. They are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless, it does NOT dry at all, it drags the water or mess all over making the floor more wet. Do not get this.
customer_reviews.author: M.B

customer_reviews.title: lives up to its name !
customer_reviews.text: a better mop than sponge heads! it does a clean job without leaving streaks of dirt. The head also comes off REALLY easy, which i was somewhat concerned about before i bought it because i have arthritis in hands and unscrewing things can present problems. I would recommend over sponge mops. It is also VERY light, even when wet. if one had quite large rooms, a bigger mop would be needed, but i think O Cedar has one also !
customer_reviews.author: arizona

customer_reviews.title: Thank you! Second time ordering it and loving it ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you ! Second time ordering it and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: GAYANE ASLANOVA

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it is lightweight and easy to use. It's easy to wring out. I have small hands and this is a good product for me. I bought two of these because they are so hard to find. My husband likes these too. Because these mops are so small, you can control them and not end up messing up your baseboards.
customer_reviews.author: Deejay

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. The only con is the size, a little small, but still useful and practical. Just don't expect a heavy mop. This is a lightweight, easy to carry mop. Most useful on small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: E747TX

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY, EASY TO USE.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for years. The newer version has a shorter handle for some reason, but you can switch to a longer mop pole with threads available in many places. Mopping is a breeze. The products soaks up water well. I have a simple twist mop pail with a wringer that gets the mop nice and dry. I also use it as a dust mop and it picks up dust with no problem. This is the mop for those with ra. It will not feel heavy even when very wet. Be aware that the mop itself comes in two different lengths. I have the shorter length and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: This mop is ok, but is smaller than I ...
customer_reviews.text: This mop is ok, but is smaller than I though and let me be clear im a short person, im only 5.4 feet. i think this is for cleaning a littler trickle but not for a deep cleaning in the entire house.
customer_reviews.author: BibiTipsTv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Mop easy to ring out light weight and cleans really great. Will buy real fill when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tin

customer_reviews.title: A very good mop. For easiest mopping (WITHOUT BENDING OVER
customer_reviews.text: A very good mop. For easiest mopping (WITHOUT BENDING OVER!!) get the pail with the matching wringer.
customer_reviews.author: gail durand

customer_reviews.title: o-cedar mops are great
customer_reviews.text: been using these mops for years. hard to find in my area. they never disappoint. so glad to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Irene  Short

customer_reviews.title: I got it as a "rinse" mop
customer_reviews.text: I use a sprayer-type Bissell floor mop with removable/washable pads for mopping, but then the floor has to be rinsed. I got this mop strictly to use for that purpose, and it works well for that purpose. Because the floor is already clean, all I have to do is rinse the extra soap out of the mop in a bucket and stick it in the bathtub or hang it over the fence outside to drip dry, in which case I don't even bother squeezing it out. It's lightweight, even when wet, and doesn't get nasty the way I'm using it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kistner

customer_reviews.title: I like this mop because it is easy to wring out
customer_reviews.text: As a cleaning lady, I like this mop because it is easy to wring out, does not lose strings, and a new mop head can be attached if needed. Also, a new handle can be easily attached if needed. The price for this mop is very reasonable, however, it is impossible to find this in any of the big stores in my town that carry cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.author: shirley roe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this mop...arrived in less then 5 days...right serve...thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Cotto

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: The mop is great. All I needed was the mop head, but it was cheaper to buy the mop and pole together. The packaging was a bit wasteful and cumbersome. I ordered 5 mops and they came one by one in a long cardboard box. WAY too much packaging and it filled my recycle container full.
customer_reviews.author: David Buchman

customer_reviews.title: O-Cedar Light'N Thirsty Mop
customer_reviews.text: Great mop for kitchen spills as well as tile floors in the home. This lightweight mop can be washed easily after use.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bitkower

customer_reviews.title: so your bucket better have one
customer_reviews.text: There is not a wring-out function; so your bucket better have one. Returning the item cost about $10, so I just ended up keeping it since that's more than half the price of the mop!
customer_reviews.author: Holli Lee Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I use these mops in my cleaning business. They ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these mops in my cleaning business. They truly are lightweight and get into corners and under things well. You have to have the self wringing bucket to go with it though. You can unscrew the mophead and wash it in your washer.
customer_reviews.author: cleanfreak

customer_reviews.title: A happy husband
customer_reviews.text: The best mop ever. I have a steam mop but wanted something that would be easier for my husband to clean the floors with during the week. Thus mop was perfect. Lightweight and super easy to use. Just what he was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Best mop for me
customer_reviews.text: This mop is light weight and just what I need. I use the bucket with a wringer to wring out the water. I like the material the mop head is made from as it works great for cleaning my hardwood floors. The head is also replaceable as well as removable to put in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria D Pliley

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've used this kind of mop "forever" because the mop heads really get into the nooks and crannies in a way that a sponge mop can never do. When I couldn't find these in my local markets, I was thrilled to find amazon carries them! The heads last a long, long time, IF you rinse and allow to air-dry between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, good length, requires more effort and repetition to mop floor properly than I expected from other reviews. However, it is sturdy and has been holding up well for such a light mop.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I like this mop because you can unscrew the head and wash it in the washing machine between uses. The heads last for a long time, I've never had to replace one. I purchased this new as I moved and discarded my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't Like It
customer_reviews.text: Only mops on one side without scraping metal, easily unscrews while rinsing, and not comfortable to hold because of the way the mop attaches to handle. Really surprised. O-Cedar has always had excellent reputation for its products.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the O-Cedar quick wring bucket. Great thing about this mop is it doesn't leave strands of cloth or material behind and it is super easy to wring out. The head is easily replaced also
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: if you don't have one of this one...you miss someting
customer_reviews.text: but you should have the red bucket from Rubber Maid with the flexible siff to squeeze the excess water out the mop
customer_reviews.author: Martina Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: When left upside down rusty colored water accumulated and runs down the handle when it's turned right side up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sue

customer_reviews.title: It's A Mop
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to, but this mop has a serious design flaw. The head does not screw on tightly, so the regular motions of mopping slowly unscrew the head until it falls off. This happens 2 or 3 times per large room.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel B.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE AND EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best mops. These mops are the least messy, easy to wring out and they dry very quickly. I've been using these mops for years and intend to only use them as long as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper mop
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first few weeks but just got old and smelly despite cleaning. If did you get it cheap it's good for you so you're in there but for an every day mop I wouldn't recommend better to spend more money
customer_reviews.author: Martin/Family/Aubree

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: The picture to me looks like a string cotton mop. It's not.. It's strings of polyester or something...
customer_reviews.author: Jean SavageTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as i would have hoped. Difficult to strain the excess water out.
customer_reviews.author: Aspiller

customer_reviews.title: Just okay...
customer_reviews.text: Just like Amazon says for 3 stars: "It's okay." You get what you pay for. The most basic mop. Easy to make anything better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew from San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little mop. Gets into impossible places. Easy to clean after I'm done. Stores easily. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: good mop, for hand wringing
customer_reviews.text: good mop , for hand wringing, I CAN'T USE THOSE LITTLE SPONGE ONES THEY DON'T DO THE JOB LIKE THIS MOP
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, but could be a little bit bigger. You have to use your hands too.
customer_reviews.author: Eva s

customer_reviews.title: good mop
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient light weight mop. Does a good job. Head is machine washable. Makes clean up easy.
customer_reviews.author: christopher phillips

customer_reviews.title: But works great.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a a way to ring out the water. But works great.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: O-CEDAR IS JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: WORST MOP EVER!! broke 4 times in my first use. UNREAL!! JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my favorite, which broke after more than a decade of good use (by other people, not by me). It is exactly what I wanted. Very fast service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Gilda

customer_reviews.title: Handy Mop
customer_reviews.text: The mop arrived on time and was well packaged. It is exactly as described. I was looking for a light mop that would work in small spaces and this hits the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! I have one that I got 20 years ago and I still use. Lightweight, durable,easy to wring out and doesn't leave streaks Just an all-round good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hartke

customer_reviews.title: Much better than what I was using
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm pretty happy with this mop because it cleans better than the flat microfiber type mop I've been using and it reaches up around the floor moldings. When I first used it, the mop head kept falling off. I couldn't tighten it enough. After my husband tightened the mop head, it never falls off, but I also cannot remove it. Oh well. Instead of tossing it in the washer, I clean it off in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean With and Easy to Clean The Mop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I love I can toss the head in the dryer and clean it immediately. It does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: happywife

customer_reviews.title: easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: light and flows smoothly. wrings out nicely with bucket easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: It pays to comparison shop
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cleaning the bathroom tile floor. The only drawback is I found both the mop & the mop bucket cheaper at Wal-Mart. Oh well, it pays to compare even if it is Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good mop.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Probably will need to replace it in a few months but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It cleans nice it's a small mop head but I have a small space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these mop heads for years. I would suggest using a linen bag when washing and air dry instead of using the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Still don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize I had to buy a wringer separately. My mistake. Still don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop
customer_reviews.text: Great Mop, I love this mop it's so light and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: Best mop ever! Easy to use, inexpensive, and really does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: O-Cedar products are fantastic & worth the money. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Good service, good price and good product. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Owl-Spirit Woman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. One time down. Did a good job,
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nourrcier

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was just purchasing the mop heads, but that's ok. Love the mop, though!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Nees

customer_reviews.title: great mop...
customer_reviews.text: very nice mop...much better than the ones at the discount stores...o cedar is a quality brand...
customer_reviews.author: Irene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much better
customer_reviews.text: I've always used a sponge mop before. I like this so much better. It's light. I feel like I'm actually picking up the dirt, rather than pushing it around. I also like it because it reaches in tight places, like behind the toilet, which isn't doable with a sponge mop. I'm actually mopping more since I got it, because it's fun. Okay, "fun" may be stretching it. But I really am enjoying having cleaner floors. Great little mop, and inexpensive, too!
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop because so far it's the only one ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting when I bough this mop, I was looking for this one specifically. This is the second one I buy, since I had to leave behind my previous one when I moved (with sadness, but my friend will use it). I love this mop because so far it's the only one doing the job I need in my home. And I also have the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Esther M. A

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I got this mop for my 80 year old mother because it is light and easy to carry but it doesn't last as long as I would have hoped. It seems that once it gets dirty it is hard to get clean again but not bad all and all.
customer_reviews.author: patricia mckenna

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mop. It does a good job on my tile floors and it is easy rinse out and dries quickly. I have been using this type for many years and like it better than cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Betty McJunkin

customer_reviews.title: This is the GREATEST mop EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the GREATEST mop EVER! I hate using dirty mop heads. With every other mop I have tried, it is nearly impossible to remove the mop head to wash. The easy twist off makes the mop head super easy to remove and we just throw it in the washing machine and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: MBF

customer_reviews.title: Makes Cleaning a Easier and Quicker
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to use and lightweight. I got it with the twist bucket and its perfect. Makes weekly cleanings a little bit easier and quicker. The only thing better is if it does the cleaning on its own...
customer_reviews.author: Sh0p4KiX

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Its a mop. But its a pretty good one. Love the bucket that comes with it as it squeezes out the water really well. There is a little cup like insert in the bucket that this mop fits into. Smart design.
customer_reviews.author: ziggy

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Light 'N Thirsty Cloth Mop
product_meta.description: Size:Cloth MopThis lightweight cloth mop’s non-woven material is designed to be superabsorbent so it cleans and dries faster than ordinary mops, while its lightweight head provides an easier clean.
feature_bullets: Is eco-friendly and machine washable up to 50x
works great for cleaning tile, linoleum and marble floors
Is compatible with the Light 'N Thirsty Cloth Mop Refill

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
